First aid information?: If in Eyes: Rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing. If Swallowed: Call a Poison Control Center or doctor immediately. Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by a Poison Control Center or doctor. If you suspect a reaction to this product: Discontinue use, take off contaminated clothing, rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes.
What special restrictions are placed on: Do not contaminate water, food or feed by storage or disposal. Never place unused product down any indoor or outdoor drain.
How, where, and on what crop should I us: This product is for outdoor use only. Do not spray in enclosed areas. Hold bottle 6 - 8 inches from skin and clothing while spraying, keeping sprayer pointed away from face. Use just enough repellent to cover exposed skin and/or clothing. Do not use under clothing. Do not spray directly onto face. Spray on hands first and then apply sparingly to face, avoiding eyes. Do not apply near eyes and mouth. Apply sparingly around ears. Do not apply over cuts, wounds or irritated skin. Do not apply to sunburned skin. Do not apply to children’s hands.
How does the product have to be stored o: Store the product in a cool, dry place, out of reach of children. If empty: Do not reuse or refill this container. Offer for recycling, if available. If partly filled: Call your local solid waste agency for disposal instructions.
